org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition

类 ResultPartitionMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.ResultPartitionMetrics

  • public class ResultPartitionMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects metrics of a result partition.

      private Gauge<java.lang.Float> getAvgQueueLenGauge() 
      private Gauge<java.lang.Integer> getMaxQueueLenGauge() 
      private Gauge<java.lang.Integer> getMinQueueLenGauge() 
      private Gauge<java.lang.Long> getTotalQueueLenGauge() 
      (专用程序包) float refreshAndGetAvg()
      Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the average number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
      (专用程序包) int refreshAndGetMax()
      Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the maximum number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
      (专用程序包) int refreshAndGetMin()
      Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the minimum number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
      (专用程序包) long refreshAndGetTotal()
      Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the total number of queued buffers in a best-effort way.
      static void registerQueueLengthMetrics(MetricGroup group, ResultPartition partition)

    • 方法详细资料

      • refreshAndGetTotal

        long refreshAndGetTotal()
        Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the total number of queued buffers in a best-effort way.
        返回:
        total number of queued buffers

      • refreshAndGetMin

        int refreshAndGetMin()
        Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the minimum number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
        返回:
        minimum number of queued buffers per sub-partition (0 if sub-partitions exist)

      • refreshAndGetMax

        int refreshAndGetMax()
        Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the maximum number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
        返回:
        maximum number of queued buffers per sub-partition

      • refreshAndGetAvg

        float refreshAndGetAvg()
        Iterates over all sub-partitions and collects the average number of queued buffers in a sub-partition in a best-effort way.
        返回:
        average number of queued buffers per sub-partition

      • getTotalQueueLenGauge

        private Gauge<java.lang.Long> getTotalQueueLenGauge()

        private Gauge<java.lang.Integer> getMinQueueLenGauge()

                                              ResultPartition partition)
